verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
Majesty worship His majesty
Unto Jesus be glory
Honor and praise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Majesty kingdom authority
Flows from His throne
Unto His own His anthems raise

verse.name: c2a
verse.lines:
So exalt lift up on high
The name of Jesus
Magnify come glorify
Christ Jesus the King

verse.name: c2b
verse.lines:
Majesty worship His majesty
Jesus who died now glorified
King of all kings

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Let there be glory, honor and praises.
Glory and honor to Jesus
Glory, honor
Glory and honor to Him
